mapper.insert: insert into ts_student (sno, name, gender, birth, class_id, political, dept_id, entry_year) values (#{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ts_student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, political = #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_year = #{entryYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sno = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sno, name, gender, birth, class_id, political, dept_id, entry_year from ts_student
